newsitem.title: INDONESIA: RESEARCH ALERT - Schroders raises Bimantara.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Schroders raises Bimantara.

text.p: Brokerage firm PT Schroders Indonesia had upgraded its rating in conglomerate PT Bimantara Citra to "outperform significantly" from "outperform" on combined strong fundamentals and a higher net asset value.

"Through our detailed analysis of Bimantara, we have arrived at a net asset value of 6,219 rupiah per share, which is substantially higher than market expectations," Schroders said in the report, dated May 28.
It said the shares were trading at a 40.5 percent discount to Schroders's net asset value (NAV) calculation of 6,219 rupiah and a 7.5 percent discount to market concensus NAV of about 4,000 rupiah.

The report said compound-annual-growth-rate of Bimantara's earnings per share (EPS) should be 26.8 percent from 1997 to 1999, well in excess of the forecast Jakarta Stock Exchange average of 16 percent.
